tool_description: Information and photos for tens of thousands of outdoor recreation locations including hiking and mountain biking trails, campgrounds, ski resorts, ATV trails, and more.
name: TrailAPI
title: TrailAPI

api_list.name: Outdoors (Legacy)
api_list.description: Support for legacy queries. Data is no longer updated, but is still available.

optional_parameters.name: radius
optional_parameters.description: Used in combination with a lat/lon. Value is in miles.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Default and maximum value is 100 results.

optional_parameters.name: q-activities_activity_type_name_eq
optional_parameters.description: Limit results to specific outdoor activity [hiking, mountain biking, camping, caving, trail running, snow sports, atv, or horseback riding]

api_list.name: Find Bike Trails
api_list.description: Find trails near a point on the map.

api_list.name: Bike Trail Info
api_list.description: Get detailed information about a single trail.

api_list.name: Trail Map List
api_list.description: Get a summary list of maps for this trail.

api_list.name: Map GPX
api_list.description: Get GPX data for a map. Returns a file in GPX format. Input (id) is a map ID, not a trail ID. To get the map ID, call /maps with the trail ID.
